task.title: Pack Instances for Offline Migration
task.shortdesc: This topic describes packing instances (VMs) for offline migration on or between Node Controllers (NCs).

ul.li: You follow the appropriate offline migration scenario for your environment; see .
You have verified the prerequisites in your selected offline scenario.
You have detached volumes from the instances that you are about to pack. IS THIS NECESSARY???
You are prepared to have the NC offline for the duration of the procedure.

taskbody.context:
When you pack an instance, the source instance is suspended. Then its configuration, virtual memory files, and virtual disk files are stored in a new file. That file can then be unpacked later on any NC running .
